cis.monopoly.gamePlay

Class Property

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis.monopoly.gamePlay.Space
      • cis.monopoly.gamePlay.Property

  • public class Property
extends Space

    Property

    This class is used in identifying the properties on the spaces on the board.
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Kyle Turske

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Property()
      This is a default constructor of a Property that sets everything to 0 or false except propGroup.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHouseCount()
      This is a method that increases the number of houses on a property, only if the number of houses is less than four and there isn't a hotel present.

        This is a constructor of a Property.
        Parameters:
        propName - This is the name of the property.
        propID - This is the ID of the property.
        propPrice - This is the price of the property.
        propRent - This is the rent of a the property.
        propGroup - This is the group associated to a property.
        propOwnerID - This is the owner of the property.
        houseCount - This the number of houses on the property.
        hasHotel - This confirms if the property has a hotel.
        housePrice - This is the price of a house for a property

      • Property

        public Property()
        This is a default constructor of a Property that sets everything to 0 or false except propGroup. propGroup is set to -1 because we plan to start at 0.
